name: Twenty Holdings, Inc.
description: Developer of health technology company intended to provide Software as a service (SaaS) solutions for health & human services departments. The company's platfrom supports a one-door approach to eligibility, enrollment, and management for programs like Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, and WIC, as well as behavioral health (988), disease surveillance, vital records, child welfare, and more, enabling health institutions and residents to improve the collective well-being of communities.
one_liner: Developer of health technology company intended to provide Software as a service (SaaS) solutions for health & human services departments. The company's platfrom supports a one-door approach to eligibility, enrollment, and management for programs like Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, and WIC, as well as behavioral health (988), disease surveillance, vital records, child welfare, and more, enabling health institutions and residents to improve the collective well-being of communities.
